addContentObject.createTooltip: Hold {{modifier}} to add an additional Content Object.
addContentObject.description: Choose the name, namespace, and values of the Content Object you want to add.
addContentObject.fileFormatInfo: All files must be of the same type. The first file uploaded will determine the file type.
addContentObject.noDefaultLanguages: No languages are checked to be displayed in the Language Manager. This is the first language found.
addContentObject.noLanguages: No languages are present in the CMS. Add languages using the Language Manager.
addContentObject.title: Add Content Object

languageManager.description: Edit the languages of the CMS. Check the languages you want to be displayed.

languageBrowser.description: Select the language you want to add to the CMS.
languageBrowser.title: Language Browser

saveConfirmation.description: Saving will delete the following languages and all their values. Are you sure?
saveConfirmation.title: Confirm Save

languageManager.title: Language Manager

translationWizard.description: The value of the chosen source language is used to generate translations for the specified target languages of the selected Content Objects.
translationWizard.ignoreEmptySourceLanguageValues: Some Content Objects have no value for the selected source language. These will be ignored.
translationWizard.ignoreFiles: File Content Objects are not translatable and will be ignored.
translationWizard.noDefaultLanguagesConfigured: To use the Translation Wizard, select at least one language to be displayed in the Language Manager.
translationWizard.noSelectedTargetLanguages: Select at least one target language.

review.description: Review the changes before applying them.
review.title: Translation Review

translationWizard.sourceLanguageInfo: Only languages configured to be displayed in the Language Manager can be chosen.
translationWizard.title: Translation Wizard
translationWizard.translationServiceNotConfigured: The Translation Service is not configured on the Axon Ivy Engine.

message.addFirstItem: Add your first Content Object to the CMS
message.emptyDetail: Select a Content Object to edit its values.
message.nameIsTaken: Name is already present in this Namespace.
message.noValues: At least one value must be present.

value.lastValue: The last value cannot be deleted
